summary: Feature request to add Ruby version requirement (>= 3.2.0) back to the gemspec now that rake-compiler-dock dependency issue is resolved.
userImpact: Ensures users install the SDK on compatible Ruby versions, preventing runtime errors from version mismatches.
proposedFix: Add required_ruby_version >= 3.2.0 to gemspec after rake-compiler-dock issue #145 is complete and released
resolutionDetails: Likely implemented after rake-compiler-dock dependency was resolved
keyQuote: With rake-compiler-dock/issues/145 complete and released, can put this limitation into the gemspec
